trans-unit.source: Alternatively, download flyr.py and include in your source tree.
trans-unit.target: 或者,下载flyr.py并包含在你的源代码树中。

trans-unit.source: Arguably simpler use: no need to create a superfluous extraction object; simply call thermal = flyr.unpack(flir_file_path) and done
trans-unit.target: 可以说使用更简单：无需创建多余的提取对象；只需调用 thermal = flyr.unpack(flir_file_path) 并完成

trans-unit.source: Call flyr.unpack on a filepath to receive a numpy array with the thermal data. Alternatively, first open the file in binary mode for reading and and pass the the file handle to flyr.unpack.
trans-unit.target: 在文件路径上调用 flyr.unpack 以接收带有热数据的numpy数组。或者，首先以二进制模式打开文件以进行读取，然后将文件句柄传递给 flyr.unpack 。
摄像机的发现不工作(尚未)。

trans-unit.source: Camera's that sometimes do and don't work:
Currently this library has been tested to work with:
trans-unit.target: 目前,这个库已经被测试与。

trans-unit.source: Easier and robust installation and deployment, because flyr.py is not an external executable
trans-unit.target: 由于 flyr.py 不是外部可执行文件，因此安装和部署更加轻松可靠

trans-unit.source: FLIR ThermaCAM P660 West (more often doesn't than does)
trans-unit.target: FLIR ThermaCAM P660 West(经常不这样做,而不是这样做)

trans-unit.source: Faster decoding because no new process needs to be started and in-memory data does not need to be communicated to this other process
trans-unit.target: 解码速度更快,因为不需要启动新的进程,内存中的数据也不需要传达给其他进程。

trans-unit.source: Flyr depends on three external packages, all installable through pip: pip install numpy nptyping pillow. Pillow does the conversion from embedded images to numpy arrays, nptyping allows for high quality array type annotations. Numpy provides the n-dimensional arrays necessary to contain the thermal and optical data.
trans-unit.target: Flyr依赖于三个外部软件包，所有这些软件包均可通过 pip install numpy nptyping pillow ：pip install numpy nptyping pillow。Pillow可以完成从嵌入式图像到numpy数组的转换，nptyping可以实现高质量的数组类型注释。Numpy提供了包含热和光学数据所必需的n维数组。

trans-unit.source: Flyr is a library for extracting thermal data from FLIR images written fully in Python, without depending on ExifTool.
trans-unit.target: Flyr是一个完全用Python编写的用于从FLIR图像中提取热数据的库,无需依赖ExifTool。

trans-unit.source: Flyr is installable from PyPi: pip install flyr.
trans-unit.target: Flyr可从PyPi pip install flyr ：pip install flyr。

trans-unit.source: Flyr is licensed under The European Union Public License 1.2. The English version is included in the license file. Translations for all EU languages, each fully legally valid, can be found at the EUPL website.
trans-unit.target: Flyr已获得欧盟公共许可证1.2的许可。许可证文件中包含英文版本。可以在EUPL网站上找到所有欧盟语言的翻译，每种翻译都具有完全合法的效力。

trans-unit.source: However, the library is still in an early phase and lacks robust handling of inconsistent files. When it encounters such an image it immediately gives up raising a ValueError, while it could also do a best effort attempt to extract anyway. This is planned.
trans-unit.target: 然而,该库仍处于早期阶段,缺乏对不一致文件的稳健处理。当它遇到这样的图像时,它会立即放弃引发一个ValueError,同时它也可以尽最大努力尝试提取。这是有计划的。

trans-unit.source: More accurate, because Flyr uses all of the metadata to translate the raw values into Kelvin, while other projects have a certain set hardcoded. The differences are often about 0.1°C, but can be as high as 0.6°C. Furthermore ExifTool rounds some of the values, while Flyr uses unrounded values from the metadata. The only starts mattering around the 6th decimal, so whether it matters is up for debate.
trans-unit.target: 更准确地说，因为Flyr使用所有元数据将原始值转换为Kelvin，而其他项目则具有一定的硬编码。差异通常约为0.1°C，但可能高达0.6°C。此外，ExifTool会舍入一些值，而Flyr使用元数据中未舍入的值。唯一的开始很重要，大约在小数点后第六位，因此是否重要尚有争议。

trans-unit.source: Other solutions are wrappers around ExifTool to actually do the hard part of extracting the thermal data. Flyr is a reimplementation of the ExifTool's FLIR parser. Practically, this offers the following benefits:
trans-unit.target: 其他解决方案是围绕ExifTool的包装器,以实际完成提取热数据的困难部分。Flyr是ExifTool的FLIR解析器的重新实现。实际上,这提供了以下好处。

trans-unit.source: Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change. Most help is currently needed supporting more models and testing against more pictures. Testing and developing for your own camera's images or FLIR Tools' samples is recommended.
trans-unit.target: 欢迎提出拉动请求。对于重大的改动,请先开一个问题,讨论你想改动的内容。目前最需要的帮助是支持更多的模型和对更多图片进行测试。建议针对您自己的相机图像或FLIR Tools的样本进行测试和开发。

trans-unit.source: This code would not be possible without ExifTool's efforts to document the FLIR format. Previous work in Python must also be acknowledged for creating a workable solution.
trans-unit.target: 没有ExifTool的努力来记录FLIR格式，就不可能使用此代码。 创建可行的解决方案时，也必须认可Python的先前工作。
